uk.ac.cam.cl.intelligentgamedesigner.coregame

Class GameStateAuxiliaryFunctions

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.cam.cl.intelligentgamedesigner.coregame.GameStateAuxiliaryFunctions

  • public class GameStateAuxiliaryFunctions
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that contains functions that are related to the functionality of the GameState.

        Returns:

      • placeInitialIngredient

        public static void placeInitialIngredient(Cell[][] board)

        Parameters:
        board - The board to place the ingredient on

      • sameColourWithCell

        public static boolean sameColourWithCell(Cell cell,
                                         CandyColour colour)
        Function that safely checks if the cell has the same colour as the candy colour given.
        Parameters:
        cell - The cell to be checked.
        colour - The colour to be checked for equality.
        Returns:
        Whether the cell has a candy and this has the colour specified.

      • analyzeTile

        public static SingleTileAnalysis analyzeTile(Position pos,
                                             Cell[][] board)
        Function to get the single tile analysis for the position on a board.
        Parameters:
        pos - The position of the cell to be checked for matches. (Note: the position should actually be in the board).
        board - The board on which this should be checked.
        Returns:
        The Single Tile Analysis for the cell specified.

      • getSingleMatchAnalysis

        public static MatchAnalysis getSingleMatchAnalysis(Cell[][] board,
                                                   Position pos)
        Function that creates the match analysis for a single cell at the specified position on the board. If the cell does not form a match then it will return null.
        Parameters:
        board - The board on which the cell is located.
        pos - The position of the cell on the board.
        Returns:
        The MatchAnalysis for that cell on the board.
